snippet: Patch’s new controlling owner took over in January, and soon after, only 15 percent of its news staff was left. It has managed to turn a profit in the last three months.
abstract: Charles C Hale, owner of Hale Global, says hyperlocal news organization Patch is on the mend; majority stake in Patch was handed over to Hale by AOL in January 2014.
lead_paragraph: Patch’s new controlling owner took over in January, and soon after, only 15 percent of its news staff was left. It has managed to turn a profit in the last three months.

headline.main: Patch Sites Turn Corner After Sale and Big Cuts
